00021 ThBuffer::ThBuffer( unsigned int size, unsigned int alignment )
00022 : _size( size )
00023 , _buffer( 0 )
00024 , _signal( false, false )
00025 {
00026         _buffer = AlignedAlloc( alignment, _size );
00027 }
00028 
00029 //----------------------------------------------------------
00030 ThBuffer::~ThBuffer()
00031 {
00032         AlignedFree( _buffer );
00033 }

00040 //----------------------------------------------------------
00041 void*
00042 ThBuffer::Acquire( bool wait )
00043 {
00045         if ( wait )
00046         {
00047                 _section.Enter();
00048                 return _buffer;
00049         }
00050 
00053         if ( !_section.TryEnter() )
00054                 return 0;
00055 
00057         return _buffer;
00058 }
00059 
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------
00061 const void*
00062 ThBuffer::Acquire( bool wait ) const
00063 {
00065         if ( wait )
00066         {
00067                 _section.Enter();
00068                 return _buffer;
00069         }
00070 
00073         if ( !_section.TryEnter() )
00074                 return 0;
00075 
00077         return _buffer;
00078 }
00079 
00080 //----------------------------------------------------------
00081 void
00082 ThBuffer::Release() const
00083 {
00084         _section.Leave();
00085 }

00087 //----------------------------------------------------------
00088 void
00089 ThBuffer::AdvanceWriteOffset( unsigned int amount )
00090 {
00091         _writeOffsetSection.Enter();
00092         _writeOffset += amount;
00093         _writeOffsetSection.Leave();
00094 }
